casebody.data:
NEW YORK STATE RIFLE & PISTOL ASSOCIATION, INC., et al., Petitioners
v.
CITY OF NEW YORK, NEW YORK, et al. No. 18-280 Supreme Court of the United States. October 7, 2019 The Respondent' Suggestion of Mootness denied. The question of mootness will be subject to further consideration at oral argument, and the parties should be prepared to discuss it.
